title: Drive Shaft, Disassemble and Reassemble

steps.text: Illustration of drive shaft
Remove drive shaft from transmission - see operation "Drive Shaft, Remove and Install"
Remove thrust washer (6) and radial needle bearing (5)
Remove 4th gear (4), needle bearing (3), and 4th gear synchroniser ring (2) from drive shaft (1)
Remove shift sleeve (1) from synchromesh body
Check all parts for damage, replace damaged parts as necessary

Press bushing (1) and 3rd/4th gear synchromesh body assembly (2), 3rd gear synchroniser ring (3), thrust washer (4), radial needle bearing (5), and 3rd gear (6) from drive shaft using KM-6220 (7) and KM-6222 (8)
Check all parts for damage; replace damaged parts as necessary
Carefully spread needle roller bearings (2, 3), then remove from drive shaft (4) in lateral direction
Remove radial needle bearing (1) from drive shaft
Check all parts for damage; replace damaged parts as necessary
Install radial needle bearing (1) to drive shaft (4)
Carefully spread needle roller bearings (2, 3), then install onto drive shaft in lateral direction
Sand down molybdenum layer on reverse side of 3rd gear synchroniser ring (2) using fine grained sandpaper (1) on smooth surface
Install 3rd gear (4) to main shaft (3)

substeps.text: Ensure that needle roller bearings (1, 2) are not damaged

steps.text: Install radial needle bearing (5) to 3rd gear
Install thrust washer (6) to 3rd gear
Install 3rd gear synchroniser ring (7) to 3rd gear Note: More recent transmissions as well as repair kits for 3rd/4th gear synchroniser ring contain wave springs (arrowed)
Install 3rd/4th gear synchromesh body for 1st/2nd (3) to drive shaft
Press bushing (2) onto drive shaft using KM-6219 (1)

steps.text: Assemble synchromesh

(III) Push slider slightly upwards. Press ball against spring

steps.text: Sand down molybdenum layer on reverse side of 4th gear synchroniser ring (2) using fine grained sandpaper (1) on smooth surface
Attach 4th gear synchroniser ring (1) and needle roller bearing (2) to synchromesh body Note: Observe installed position
Install 4th gear (4) with radial needle bearing (3), radial roller bearing (5) and thrust washer (6) to drive shaft

steps.text: Install drive shaft to transmission - see operation "Drive Shaft, Remove and Install"
